com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses

Class HITreemap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses.HISeries
      • com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses.HITreemap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HIChartsJSONSerializable

    public class HITreemap
extends HISeries
    description: A treemap series. If the type option is not specified, it is inherited from chart.type. For options that apply to multiple series, it is recommended to add them to the plotOptions.series options structure. To apply to all series of this specific type, apply it to plotOptions. treemap.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Boolean allowDrillToNode
      description: When enabled the user can click on a point which is a parent and zoom in on its children.
      java.lang.Boolean alternateStartingDirection
      description: Enabling this option will make the treemap alternate the drawing direction between vertical and horizontal.
      HIColor borderColor
      description: The color of the border surrounding each tree map item.
      HIDrillUpButton drillUpButton
      description: Options for the button appearing when drilling down in a treemap.
      java.lang.Boolean ignoreHiddenPoint
      description: Whether to ignore hidden points when the layout algorithm runs.
      java.lang.Boolean interactByLeaf
      description: This option decides if the user can interact with the parent nodes or just the leaf nodes.
      java.lang.String layoutAlgorithm
      description: This option decides which algorithm is used for setting position and dimensions of the points.
      java.lang.String layoutStartingDirection
      description: Defines which direction the layout algorithm will start drawing.
      java.lang.Boolean levelIsConstant
      description: Used together with the levels and allowDrillToNode options.
      java.util.ArrayList<HILevels> levels
      description: Set options on specific levels.
      java.lang.Number opacity
      description: The opacity of a point in treemap.
      java.lang.Number sortIndex
      description: The sort index of the point inside the treemap level.

    • Field Detail

      • levelIsConstant

        public java.lang.Boolean levelIsConstant
        description: Used together with the levels and allowDrillToNode options. When set to false the first level visible when drilling is considered to be level one. Otherwise the level will be the same as the tree structure. default: true

      • drillUpButton

        public HIDrillUpButton drillUpButton
        description: Options for the button appearing when drilling down in a treemap.

      • borderColor

        public HIColor borderColor
        description: The color of the border surrounding each tree map item. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/maps/plotoptions/series-border/ : Borders demo default: #e6e6e6

      • layoutStartingDirection

        public java.lang.String layoutStartingDirection
        description: Defines which direction the layout algorithm will start drawing. Possible values are "vertical" and "horizontal". accepted values: ["vertical", "horizontal"] default: vertical

      • levels

        public java.util.ArrayList<HILevels> levels
        description: Set options on specific levels. Takes precedence over series options, but not point options. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-levels/ : Styling dataLabels and borders https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/demo/treemap-with-levels/ : Different layoutAlgorithm

      • ignoreHiddenPoint

        public java.lang.Boolean ignoreHiddenPoint
        description: Whether to ignore hidden points when the layout algorithm runs. If false, hidden points will leave open spaces. default: true

      • interactByLeaf

        public java.lang.Boolean interactByLeaf
        description: This option decides if the user can interact with the parent nodes or just the leaf nodes. When this option is undefined, it will be true by default. However when allowDrillToNode is true, then it will be false by default. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-interactbyleaf-false/ : False https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-interactbyleaf-true-and-allowdrilltonode/ : InteractByLeaf and allowDrillToNode is true

      • opacity

        public java.lang.Number opacity
        description: The opacity of a point in treemap. When a point has children, the visibility of the children is determined by the opacity. default: 0.15

      • allowDrillToNode

        public java.lang.Boolean allowDrillToNode
        description: When enabled the user can click on a point which is a parent and zoom in on its children. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-allowdrilltonode/ : Enabled default: false

      • alternateStartingDirection

        public java.lang.Boolean alternateStartingDirection
        description: Enabling this option will make the treemap alternate the drawing direction between vertical and horizontal. The next levels starting direction will always be the opposite of the previous. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-alternatestartingdirection-true/ : Enabled default: false

      • layoutAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String layoutAlgorithm
        description: This option decides which algorithm is used for setting position and dimensions of the points. Can be one of sliceAndDice, stripes, squarified or strip. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-layoutalgorithm-sliceanddice/ : SliceAndDice by default https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-layoutalgorithm-stripes/ : Stripes https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-layoutalgorithm-squarified/ : Squarified https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-layoutalgorithm-strip/ : Strip accepted values: ["sliceAndDice", "stripes", "squarified", "strip"] default: sliceAndDice

      • sortIndex

        public java.lang.Number sortIndex
        description: The sort index of the point inside the treemap level. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/treemap-sortindex/ : Sort by years
